texts: Your application can take up to 10 working days to process - we'll contact you to let you know the outcome. In the meantime you need to pay the Congestion Charge if you drive within the zone.
The discount only applies to the Congestion Charge. If a vehicle does not meet the emission standards you still need to pay the ULEZ charge.
You need to pay the Congestion Charge until your discount has been approved. Find out if you also need to pay the ULEZ charge by selecting 'Pay to drive in London'.
Set up Auto Pay to be billed automatically for the ULEZ. If your vehicle does not meet the emission standards you need to pay the ULEZ charge when you drive within central London.
You'll pay automatically for any Congestion Charge or ULEZ charges for driving within central London.
